short_description.en: Rebate up to $2000 available based on Heat Pump SEER value.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $2,000 dólares según el valor SEER de la bomba de calor.

short_description.en: Rebate up to $2000 available based on Heat Pump SEER value.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $2,000 dólares según el valor SEER de la bomba de calor.

short_description.en: Rebate up to $2500 for residential photovolatic and wind system installation.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $2,500 dólares para sistemas fotovoltaicos y eólicos residenciales.

short_description.en: Rebate of $500 for each minimum usable capacity battery unit of 5 kWh, installed on or after Jan 9, 2022.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 dólares por cada unidad de batería de 5 kWh de capacidad mínima utilizable instalada a partir del 9 de enero del 2022.

short_description.en: Up to $600 rebate for attic insulation installed by SRP insulation program contactor.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $600 dólares para aislamiento del ático instalado por un contratista del programa de aislamiento SRP.

short_description.en: $500 rebate for at least 2.8 UEW HPWH installed by contractor licensed in Arizona between July 1, 2023 and April 30, 2025.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 para un calentador de agua con bomba de calor y capacidad mínima de 2.8 instalado por un contratista de UEW certificado en Arizona entre el 1 de julio y el 30 de abril del 2024.

short_description.en: Save $250 on a new Level 2 smart charger by shopping SRP Marketplace.
short_description.es: Ahorre $250 dólares en un nuevo cargador inteligente de nivel 2 comprando en SRP Marketplace.

short_description.en: Save $250 on a new Level 2 smart charger on or after Jan. 1, 2022, and submitted a rebate application within 90 days of purchase.
short_description.es: Ahorre $250 dólares en un nuevo cargador inteligente de nivel 2 a partir del 1 de enero de 2022 y presente una solicitud de reembolso en los 90 días siguientes a la compra.

short_description.en: $100 Rebate for Electric Storage Water Heater with a .93+ Uniform Energy Factor (UEF).
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $100 dólares para calentadores de agua eléctricos con un factor de energía uniforme (o UEF) de .93+.

short_description.en: $500 rebate for all electric package heat pump with a 14.3 SEER2/6.7 HSPF2 minimum rating.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 dólares para bombas de calor con sistema eléctrico integral de 14.3 SEER2/6.7 HSPF2 como mínimo.

short_description.en: $500 rebate for all electric split system heat pump with a 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 dólares para todas las bombas de calor eléctricas de sistema dividido con una calificación mínima de 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2.

short_description.en: $500 rebate for all electric ductless heat pump with a minimum 2 tons and must have 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 dólares para todas las bombas de calor eléctricas sin ductos de un mínimo de 2 toneladas y una calificación mínima de 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2.

short_description.en: $200 rebate for an electric heat pump with a 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating paired with a gas furnace with minimum 81% efficiency.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $200 dólares para una bomba de calor eléctrica con una clasificación mínima de 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 combinada con un calefactor de gas de una eficiencia mínima del 81%.

short_description.en: Up to $900 rebate for heat pump quality installation.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $900 dólares por la instalación de una bomba de calor de calidad.

short_description.en: Weatherization improvements for homes for limited-income customers.
short_description.es: Mejoras de climatización para viviendas de clientes con ingresos limitados.

short_description.en: $400 rebate for TEP residential customers who purchase and install an Energy Star HPWH equipped with a wireless, programmable controller.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $400 dólares para los clientes residenciales de TEP que compren e instalen un calentador de agua con bomba de calor Energy Star equipado con un temporizador/controlador inalámbrico y programable.

short_description.en: Assistance available for energy efficient retrofitting to homes of income-qualifying customers.
short_description.es: Reacondicionamiento para la eficiencia energética en hogares de clientes que cumplen nivel de ingresos.

short_description.en: Up to $450 rebate for an Energy Star heat pump/AC purchase and installation through a qualified contractor.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $450 dólares por la compra e instalación de una bomba de calor.

short_description.en: Rebate of up to $1,125 back on initial investment for qualifying energy-efficient central AC units, heat pumps or heat pump mini splits.
Up to $100 off your bill when you allow your thermostat to automatically adjust a few degress higher during periods of high demand.
Up to $400 off of duct testing and qualified repair costs, or 75% of costs.
A rebate of $0.30 / square foot (up to $600) on installed cool roofing material.
$1/square foot rebate on professionally installed shade screens or window film.
Rebate of $3/square foot on professionally installed ENERGY STAR rated replacement windows.
Up to $100 rebate on an in-person Home Energy Audit by an independent Home Performance contractor.
$250 rebate on the purchase and installation of a demand installation system, available for SRP customers installing a new rooftop solar system.
Up to $750 rebate for air conditioner quality installation.
Up to $300 rebate on duct sealing (varies based on actual leakage reduced).
Up to $120/ton rebate on mini split heat pump or air conditioner.
Up to $175 rebate on AC tuneup, including refrigerant charge repair, indoor coil cleaning, and outdoor coil cleaning.
Up to $35 rebate for qualified smart thermostat.
Up to $375 rebate for air conditioner quality installation.
Up to $150 rebate on duct sealing, varies based on actual leakage reduced.
Up to $200 on AC tuneup, including refrigerant charge repair, indoor coil cleaning, and outdoor coil cleaning.
Rebate of %60 per unit for recycled refrigerators or freezers.
$30 rebate for non-heat pump clothes dryers, $90 rebate per unit for a vent-less heat pump clothes dryer.
$100 rebate for electric-to-induction range replacements, $350 for gas-to-induction range replacement or new construction. Must be 30" or larger.
$25 rebate for smart thermostats.
Rebate for $250/ton off ductless air-source heat pumps, up to 5 tons. Cannot exceed 50% of equipment cost.
Rebate for $500/ton off ductless air source cold-climate pumps, up to 5 tons. $250/ton for additional capacity. Cannot exceed 50% of equipment cost.
Rebate for $250/ton off ducted air source cold-climate heat pumps, up to 5 tons. $125/ton for additional capacity. $500 bonus for propane dual-fuel.
Rebate for $500/ton off ducted cold-climate air source heat pumps, up to 5 tons. $250/ton for additional capacity. $500 bonus for propane dual-fuel.
Rebate for $500/ton off of air to water heat pumps, up to 5 tons. $250/ton for additional capacity over 5 tons.
Rebate for $500/ton off of new ground source heat pump systems. $250/ton for replacement systems. $100 per unit for hot water systems.
$100 rebate for replacement or new installation of a whole house fan.
$200 rebate for replacement or new installation of an evaporative cooler.
$100 rebate for an ENERGY STAR rated split system air-conditioning unit.
25-50% rebate on electric outdoor power equipment with caps up to $5,000, dependent on the technology.,.
Rebate of 25% of the cost of an electric bicycle, up to $150.
Rebate of $150 per smart thermostat, up to two units.
Rebate of $200/ton for electric heat pumps with electric backup or dual fuel, and ground source heat pumps (with electric backup).
Rebate up to $1,475 for a 400 amp service. Available when providing the installation of an all-electric or hybrid heat pump necesitates the service.
Up to $300 rebate for air duct repair.
Up to $150 rebate on an ENERGY STAR variable speed pool pump.
Up to $250 rebate on a Level 2 EV charger.
Rebate of 50% of the cost of attic insulation, up to $300.
Rebate of up to $250 for replacing current water heater with a heat pump water heater.
Rebate of up to $500 for an energy efficient HVAC unit. Rebate increases depending on SEER rating.
Up to $100 rebate for an ENERGY STAR certified induction cooktop/stove.
Up to $50 rebate for a smart thermostat.
Up to $0.80/square foot rebate for solar shade screens.
Up to $50 rebate for ENERGY STAR certified, electric washer/dryer.
Up to $400/ton rebate for energy efficient heat pumps and groundwater source heat pumps.
$350 rebate on all qualified heat pump water heaters.
Free virtual energy checkup from an Arizona Public Service energy advisor. Can also pay $99 for an in-person home performance checkup.
$250 rebate for duct repair and sealing.
$250 rebate for instulation - attic, walls, crawl spaces, etc.
$50 rebate for a qualified home energy monitor.
$200 rebate for a water heater timer.
$30 rebate for a qualifying smart thermostat. Get an additional $85 rebate on select thermostats when you enroll in APS's Cool Rewards program.
$200 rebate for replacing an old or broken air conditioner with a new one. Customers enrolled in the Energy Support program can get up to $1,200.
Air-conditioning replacement program through Community Action Agencies across Arizona, 100% of project cost available for households under 80% AMI.
Air-conditioning replacement program through Community Action Agencies, 50% of project costs available for households between 80% and 150% AMI.
Rebate of 100% of ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater costs for households below 80% AMI, up to $1,750.
Rebate of 50% of ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater costs for households between 80% and 150% AMI, up to $1,750.
Rebate of 100% of ENERGY STAR air source heat pump costs for households below 80% AMI, up to $8,000.
Rebate of 50% of ENERGY STAR air source heat pump costs for households between 80% and 150% AMI, up to $8,000.
Rebate of 100% of ENERGY STAR heat pump clothes dryer costs for households under 80% AMI, up to $840.
Rebate of 50% of ENERGY STAR heat pump clothes dryer costs for households between 80% and 150% AMI, up to $840.
Rebate of 100% of ENERGY STAR electric stove, cooktop, range, or oven costs for households under 80% AMI, up to $840.
Rebate of 50% of ENERGY STAR electric stove, cooktop, range, or oven costs for households between 80% and 150% AMI, up to $840.
Rebate of 100% of electrical load service center (electrical panel) costs for households under 80% AMI, up to $4,000.
Rebate of 50% of electrical load service center (electrical panel) costs for households between 80% and 150% AMI, up to $4,000.
Rebate of 100% of electrical wiring costs for households below 80% AMI, up to $2,500.
Rebate of 50% of electrical wiring costs for households between 80% and 150% AMI, up to $2,500.
Rebate of 100% of insulation, air sealing, and ventilation costs for households under 80% AMI, up to $1,600.
Rebate of 50% of insulation, air sealing, and ventilation costs for households between 80% and 150% AMI, up to $1,600.
